bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: Blake Porter is riding high, until he's not. Fired abruptly from his job as a VP of marketing and unable to make the mortgage payments on the new brownstone he shares with his fiancée, he's desperate to make ends meet. Enter Whitney....
bestsellers.title: The Tenant

bestsellers.author: Matt Dinniman
bestsellers.description: A man. His ex-girlfriend's cat. A sadistic game show unlike anything in the universe: a dungeon crawl where survival depends on killing your prey in the most entertaining way possible....
bestsellers.title: Dungeon Crawler Carl

bestsellers.author: Shantel Tessier
bestsellers.description: Barrington University is home of the Lords, a secret society that requires their blood in payment. They are above all—the most powerful men in the world. They devote their lives to violence in exchange for power. And during their senior year, they are offered a chosen one....
bestsellers.title: The Ritual

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: Working here is my last chance to start fresh. I can pretend to be whoever I like. But I’ll soon learn that the Winchesters’ secrets are far more dangerous than my own....
bestsellers.title: The Housemaid

bestsellers.author: Matt Dinniman
bestsellers.description: A floating fortress occupied by warrior gnomes. A castle made of sand. A derelict submarine guarded by malfunctioning machines. A haunted crypt surrounded by lethal traps....
bestsellers.title: The Gate of the Feral Gods

bestsellers.author: Shelby Van Pelt
bestsellers.description: After Tova Sullivan’s husband died, she began working the night shift at the Sowell Bay Aquarium, mopping floors and tidying up....
bestsellers.title: Remarkably Bright Creatures

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: It’s hard to find an employer who doesn’t ask too many questions about my past. So I thank my lucky stars that the Garricks miraculously give me a job, cleaning their stunning penthouse with views across the city and preparing fancy meals in their shiny kitchen....
bestsellers.title: The Housemaid's Secret

bestsellers.author: Mark Greaney
bestsellers.description: With his lover imprisoned in a Russian gulag, the Gray Man will stop at nothing to free her in this latest entry in the number one New York Times best-selling series.
bestsellers.title: Midnight Black

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: She's looking for the perfect man. He's looking for the perfect victim.
bestsellers.title: The Boyfriend

bestsellers.author: Anthony Horowitz
bestsellers.description: Editor Susan Ryeland has left her Greek island, her hotel and her Greek boyfriend, Andreas, in search of a new life back in England.
bestsellers.title: Marble Hall Murders

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: The Lowells’ maid isn’t the only strange thing on our street. I’m sure I see a shadowy figure watching us. My husband leaves the house late at night. And when I meet a woman who lives across the way, her words chill me to the bone: Be careful of your neighbors....
bestsellers.title: The Housemaid Is Watching

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: As Charly struggles to recover from her brain injury, she begins to realize that the events of that fateful night are trapped in the damaged right side of her brain. Now, she must put the jigsaw pieces together to discover the identity of the man who tried to kill her....
bestsellers.title: Brain Damage

bestsellers.author: Nathan Hystad
bestsellers.description: Caesar, an undercover operative, enters Carmichael with the briefest of orders from his boss and a countdown on his phone. What will happen when the clock strikes zero?
bestsellers.title: Taken

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: Tegan is eight months pregnant, alone, and desperately wants to put her crumbling life in the rearview mirror. So she hits the road, planning to stay with her brother until she can figure out her next move. But she doesn't realize she's heading straight into a blizzard.
bestsellers.title: The Crash

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: Victoria Barnett has it all: a great career as a nurse practitioner, a handsome and loving husband, a beautiful home in the suburbs, and a plan to fill it with children. Life is perfect—or so it seems.
bestsellers.title: The Wife Upstairs

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: Newlyweds Tricia and Ethan are searching for the house of their dreams. But when they visit the remote manor that once belonged to Dr. Adrienne Hale, a renowned psychiatrist who vanished without a trace four years earlier, a violent winter storm traps them at the estate....
bestsellers.title: Never Lie

bestsellers.author: Kate Quinn
bestsellers.description: The New York Times bestselling author of The Diamond Eye and The Rose Code returns with a haunting and powerful story of female friendships and secrets in a Washington, DC, boardinghouse during the McCarthy era.
bestsellers.title: The Briar Club

bestsellers.author: William Kent Krueger
bestsellers.description: In 1958, a small Minnesota town is rocked by a shocking murder, pouring fresh fuel on old grievances in this dazzling novel.
bestsellers.title: The River We Remember

bestsellers.author: Darby Kane
bestsellers.description: Darby Kane, author of the #1 international bestseller Pretty Little Wife, returns with another twisty domestic thriller about a wife wondering who tried to kill her husband twice before finally succeeding… because that was supposed to be her job.
bestsellers.title: What the Wife Knew

bestsellers.author: Michael Crichton
bestsellers.description: A classic thriller from #1 New York Times bestselling author Michael Crichton, Sphere is a bravura demonstration of what he does better than anyone: riveting storytelling that combines frighteningly plausible, cutting-edge science and technology with pulse-pounding action....
bestsellers.title: Sphere

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: Cassie thinks she has met the perfect man. Think again, Cassie....
bestsellers.title: The Ex

bestsellers.author: Gillian McAllister
bestsellers.description: From the author of Reese’s Book Club Pick and New York Times bestseller Wrong Place Wrong Time comes an addictive thriller about a new mother’s world upended when her husband commits a terrifying crime.
bestsellers.title: Famous Last Words

bestsellers.author: Shantel Tessier
bestsellers.description: The men in the secret society known as the Lords think they rule the world. And in a way, they do. Each has sold their soul to the devil at a young age in exchange for power and wealth. Like anything else, they have different levels of success.
bestsellers.title: Carnage

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: Eve has a good life. She wakes up each day, kisses her husband Nate, and heads off to teach math at the local high school. All is as it should be. Except… Last year, Caseham High was rocked by a scandal involving a student-teacher affair, with one student, Addie, at its center.
bestsellers.title: The Teacher

bestsellers.author: Ken Follett
bestsellers.description: Ken Follett's masterful new prequel The Evening and the Morning takes us on an epic journey into a historical past rich with ambition and rivalry, death and birth, love and hate, that will end where The Pillars of the Earth begins....
bestsellers.title: The Evening and the Morning

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: There are three rules Brooke Sullivan must follow as a new nurse practitioner at a men’s maximum-security prison: 1) Treat all prisoners with respect. 2) Never reveal any personal information. 3) Never EVER become too friendly with the inmates....
bestsellers.title: The Inmate

bestsellers.author: Jessie Garcia
bestsellers.description: Stephanie and Jessica have nothing and everything in common. The two women don’t know each other but are on the same plane heading to California. Stephanie is on a business trip and Jasmine is fleeing an abusive relationship.
bestsellers.narrated_by: Andrew Eiden, Dylan Reilly Fitzpatrick, Fred Berman, and others
bestsellers.title: The Business Trip

bestsellers.author: Freida McFadden
bestsellers.description: While eleven-year-old Nora Davis was up in her bedroom doing homework, she had no idea her father was killing women in the basement. Until the day the police arrived at their front door.
bestsellers.title: The Locked Door

bestsellers.author: Iliana Xander
bestsellers.description: Mackenzie Casper is a brilliant student. But she is best known for her mother, a best-selling author whose dark, twisted thrillers have a dedicated worldwide fanbase.
bestsellers.narrated_by: Kira Fixx, Laura Horowitz, Walker Williams, and others
bestsellers.title: Love, Mom
